$Berly entered the game with the count 3-1 on Hack. Berly threw ball four but the walk was charged to Pearce.
$Jurges 'slid into second with one foot hoisted high as Bartell's waist line'

$The Phillies dugout was razzing Jurges for his hard slide in the fourth. Jurges retaliated by throwing two baseballs into the Phillies dugout. The Phillies threw one ball back, almost hitting Jurges. Then several Phillies charged Jurges from the dugout, prompting several Cubs to also leave their dugout. Order was restored with no ejections.
$This was Dolph Camilli's first major-league hit.
$Game called for darkness

$The Phillies dugout was razzing Jurges for his hard slide in the fourth. Jurges retaliated by throwing two baseballs into the Phillies dugout. The Phillies threw one ball back, almost hitting Jurges. Then several Phillies charged Jurges from the dugout, prompting several Cubs to also leave their dugout. Order was restored with no ejections.
$This was Dolph Camilli's first major-league hit.
